actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to make applicable to the Tennessee-Tombigbee Waterway certain provisions of law relating to taxation on fuel used in commercial transportation on inland waterways.

summary.text: Amends the Inland Waterways Revenue Act of 1978 to make applicable to the Tennessee- Tombigbee Waterway specified provisions relating to the tax on fuel used in commercial transportation on inland waterways.

titles.title: A bill to make applicable to the Tennessee-Tombigbee Waterway certain provisions of law relating to taxation on fuel used in commercial transportation on inland waterways.
